ARABIC: قَالَ وَمَا عِلْمِى بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'What do I know about what they have been doing?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He said: "It is not for me to know what they were doing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Noah said: "What knowledge do I have about their deeds?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Noah) said, "I have no knowledge of their deeds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He said, “What do I know what their deeds are?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He said: "And what knowledge have I of what they used to do"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: And what knowledge have I of what they do?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He said, 'What knowledge have I of that they have been doing?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: And what knowledge have I of what they may have been doing (in the past)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He said, "What knowledge do I have of their doings?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He said: I have no knowledge of that which they have been Working.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘What do I know as to what they used to do?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He said: "And what do I know as to what they do?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He said: "And what knowledge have I of what they used to do?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He said: 'I have no knowledge of what they have done.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “What do I know about what they do?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He said, "And what is my knowledge of what they used to do?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:112] He said, ‘And what do I know of what they may have been doing?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He said) Noah said: (And what knowledge have I of what they may have been doing (in the past)) I do not know whether it is you or them who will agree with me?
